name: Swap Out and Bingo Buddy
description:
When you draw seven Scrabble tiles from the bag, the odds they make the seven-letter word, a Bingo in Scrabble parlance, is 12.6%. Today, though, the odds are good!

In Swap-Out, you can swap any tiles you don't want up to ten times in your quest to get a Bingo.

In Bingo Buddy, the seven tiles you draw a guaranteed to form a valid word. You just need to rearrange the letters.

Created for Dogpit Jam XII: The Odds Are Good
